pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculation and Application of p-Variation // The calculation of p-variation of the finite sample data. This package is a realisation of the procedure described in Butkus, V. Norvaisa, R. Lith Math J (2018). doi: 10.1007/s10986-018-9414-3 The formal definitions and reference into literature are given in vignette.
